text: Hey, Sarah. I'm dealing with a persistent bug in this section of the code. I can't figure it out and I may need your expertise. Sure, Tom. I can take a look at it. Let's start by identifying the issue. Where does it seem to be happening? Well, I believe it may be related to data processing. I've tried a few things, but it could be something more complicated. I see. I should probably debug it step by step. With your input, we can work together to solve this problem.
